short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily send handwritten postcards, letters, and notecards through thanks.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thanks.io allows you to easily send postcards & letters to your contacts. Our chrome extension automatically finds addresses on websites you visit & allows you easy 1 click sending to those addresses. You can now also add these addresses to your mailing lists with this update.
